scripts.browserify: browserify src/index.js -t babelify -t workerify -t browserify-shim --standalone 3mf-parser --exclude rx --outfile lib/3mf-parser.js
scripts.release-patch: git checkout master && git commit -a -m 'Build lib/'; npm version patch && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-minor: git checkout master && git commit -a -m 'Build lib/'; npm version minor && git push origin master --tags
scripts.release-major: git checkout master && git commit -a -m 'Build lib/'; npm version major && git push origin master --tags r
